articles.title: Ministry of Atomic Energy Industry to Be Set Up
articles.content:
Ministry of Atomic Energy Industry to Be Set Up
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- The DPRK decided to set up the Ministry of Atomic Energy Industry for the purpose of modernizing the nation's atomic energy industry and putting it on a solid foundation of latest science and technology so as to increase the production of nuclear materials, improve their quality and further develop the independent nuclear energy industry. 
					The Presidium of the DPRK Supreme People's Assembly promulgated a decree in this regard on Thursday.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Accused of Faking up Story about "North's Work"
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Accused of Faking up Story about "North's Work"
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- The situation on the Korean Peninsula is still close to the brink of a war due to the U.S. anti- DPRK vicious hostile policy and its escalating moves for a nuclear war.
					The north-south relations have reached an uncontrollable phase owing to the south Korean puppet forces' persistent moves for confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					Pursuant to a new scenario of Chongwadae, the south Korean "Ministry of Science for Future Creation" faked up the results of investigation into the "March 20 hacking case" on April 10 in which it claimed that this was "the work done by the north" and opened them to the public, kicking up a new racket for confrontation with the DPRK.
					
					In this regard a spokesman for the General Staff of the Korean People's Army gave the following answer to a question put by the newspaper Joson Inmingun on Friday:
					
					According to screams made by south Korean puppet media, broadcasting services such as KBS, MBC and YTN and large and small financial businesses were all paralyzed by successive cyber attacks from 2 p.m. on March 20, putting all parts of south Korea into the "greatest chaos in its history".
					
					The so-called "March 20 hacking case" touted by the puppet group destroyed tens of thousands of servers and computers and "paralyzed" relevant computer networks, causing "great chaos of computer networks" such as suspension of news service at broadcasting services and paralysis of banking  service at financial networks.
					
					The puppet group styling itself "IT power" refrained from opening the case to the public as it felt ashamed of the shocking chaos caused by it.
					
					From the outset of the case, it drew a conclusion that the case might be "the work done by the north" before starting an overall investigation.
					
					The results of the investigation confirmed that hacking into the computer networks of broadcasting services and financial businesses started from a third country quite contrary to the group's expectation, sparking a big furor.
					
					When relevant countries protested against it, the puppet group officially announced that a reanalysis of the case made it clear that the internet address of an employee of the "Agricultural Cooperative Association", one of the financial businesses, was the origin of the hacking attack and it was a "deliberate attack" started by a staff member of a certain broadcasting service out of his grievance. 
					
					An international hacking team called "Who Is" claimed responsibility for the paralysis of all south Korean computer networks unexpectedly at a time when public was deriding the puppet group's results of investigation which changed day and night. The group thus became a laughing stock in the eyes of the world.
					
					As its spate of rhetoric could not help conceal its lack of ability and ignorance, the puppet group suddenly announced the "results of investigation" on Apr. 10, 2013 in which it claimed the cyber attack was the "north's work" though the curtain was hurriedly lowered on the "March 20 hacking case." 
					
					Explaining the reason for such claim, the group asserted the north made 1 590 accesses to the south Korean computer networks from June 28 last year to the very day before the launch of attack, adding that the north made long-term preparations for attack and the group  found out its trace.
					
					It is a common method used by hackers to hide themselves to abuse other's IP address or fake it up on open internet for hacking. The group claims that a few records of IP addresses by which accesses were made to south Korean computer networks prove that the case was the "north's work." This cannot be construed otherwise than evidence of ignorance of how cyber warfare is waged.
					
					Another reason the puppet group came out to support its claim is that places used for hacking attack which occurred in the past period are identical to those used for the recent case.
					
					Generally, hackers are using weak targets in global websites as their places for hacking operations. The weaker targets are, the more frequently they are used by more hackers as places for hacking operations. It is as foolish an act as to term specified countries or groups as hackers because of their repeated use.
					
					It is out of common sense to claim that the north used the same places for hacking operations for several years as they call for precision and stealth. It is the far-fetched assertion to be made only by the group to judge that the case was "the work done by the north".
					
					The group said more than 30 malignant codes out of 76 kinds of those codes collected and analyzed in the course of the investigation were identical to the attacking codes used in the past and attacking method was also identical to that employed for major cases presumed to be the "work done by the north" in the last period, a proof of the "work done by the north". This assertion is utterly baseless.
					
					All this goes to clearly prove that what the group claims is nothing but a sinister plot hatched by those hell-bent on the confrontation with fellow countrymen, bereft of even an elementary concept of the cyber warfare.
					
					The investigation results are peppered with absurd assertions and sophism. This is clear from the following string of derision and censure of the present south Korean authorities made by people of various circles: "The present regime is a government accustomed to shifting the blame for every case onto the north", "it is very strange to find lots of No. 1s in the hacking codes", "the north might be also to blame for the snow which did damage to crops yesterday," "was the apology made by the Broadcasting and News Agency Committee and the Agency for Promoting Internet for the 'March 20 case' a lie?" and "the government's announcement that the case was the 'work done by the north' was what we expected."
					
					If any case or misfortune occur in south Korea, the puppet group is apt to groundlessly link them to the north, regarding them as a good opportunity of escalating confrontation with compatriots. Such behavior is an inveterate bad habit of the puppet group.
					
					A scrutiny into the recent history of the inter-Korean relations clearly tells that the puppet group has linked every case to the DPRK from the Cheonan warship sinking case to the "paralysis of computer network at the Agricultural Cooperative Association", "the case of GPS wave disorder", etc.
					
					It is none other than the puppet group which has never missed an opportunity to talk about "the north's work" as evidenced by the fact that it wrote letters "No. 1" in the north-style on a sunk old fishing boat and claimed a bridge collapsed because of the "north's bomb No. 1" though it was caused by its wrong construction.
					
					What should never be overlooked is that the puppet group is baselessly accusing the Korean People's Army whenever an abnormal case occurs in south Korea.
					
					The puppet group misled the public opinion, claiming that the KPA was to blame for all cases. For example, when the Cheonan warship sinking case took place in the West Sea, the group salvaged a torpedo propeller from the bottom of the East Sea of Korea where it had been laying for several years to assert that it is "convincing evidence" proving a torpedo attack of the KPA.
					
					Lurking behind this is a cunning ulterior design of the puppet group.
					
					The revolutionary armed forces of the DPRK all out to devotedly defend the sovereignty of the country and the dignity of the nation are demonstrating their might as a mouthpiece of justice and an invincible army which mercilessly punishes injustice.
					
					Taken aback by the toughest reaction of the KPA which mercilessly foils any act of escalating confrontation with compatriots and maneuvers to ignite a war, the puppet group has hatched such base plot to tarnish the dignified image of the DPRK by labeling it "a terrorist state" and  its army a "provocateur." 
					
					The story that "the March 20 hacking case" was "the north's work" spread by the puppet group once again proves that nothing has changed since the old chief of Chongwadae was replaced by the new one.
					
					When the present chief executive of south Korea called for "keeping a distance" from traitor Lee Myung Bak in her election commitments, people were skeptical about them from the outset.
					
					They did so because of their worry that she might follow in the footsteps of Lee Myung Bak, top-class confrontation maniac, who pushed the north-south relations of reconciliation and cooperation to the phase of confrontation and war through vicious policy for confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					Time has proved that their worry is not groundless.
					
					Lee orchestrated the hideous conspiratorial farce, the first of its  kind in the history of division, such as the Cheonan warship sinking case and labeled it the "north's work", bringing the inter-Korean relations to a total collapse. The present chief executive of south Korea claimed the "March 20 hacking case" was the "north's work" in a desperate bid to ignite a war on this land where the situation was pushed to the brink of a war.
					
					The reality goes to fully prove that the chief executive is just the same as Lee in the confrontation posture and outmatches him in base and venomous nature.
					
					If there be any difference between Lee and the present chief executive, Lee, backed by his American master, cooked up the story that the Cheonan case was "the work done by the north" but she let the new "Ministry of Science for Future Creation" perform its mission as a ministry hatching a plot to cook up the story about the "work done by the north", a charade for escalating the confrontation with fellow countrymen.
					
					The recent case marked an occasion which proved that the south Korean puppet group is a hordes of traitors steeped in sycophancy and submission.
					
					Shortly ago, a scientific and technological institute of south Korea objectively photographed the DPRK's satellite Kwangmyongsong 3-2 on its regular orbit and opened it to the public but the puppet group is still zealously joining the U.S. in its moves for a nuclear war, echoing its master's claim that it was a missile launch.
					
					One cannot tolerate such a profound confusing of right and wrong.
					
					It is clear that the puppet group is the one of worst traitors as it is working hard to invent a pretext for igniting a war, currying favor with its master despite the grave situation where the outbreak of a nuclear war on this land is becoming a fait accompli due to the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK.
					
					No wonder, people paint the present puppet group as "human parrot" blindly echoing the brigandish outbursts of its master and "American robot" acting according to a program worked out by him.
					
					The south Korean puppet group's claim that "the March 20 hacking case" was "the work done by the north" is a deliberate provocation to push the situation on the Korean Peninsula to an extreme phase by taking advantage of the U.S. nuclear war racket and another anti-DPRK confrontation hysteria as it is a replica of the Cheonan warship sinking case.
					
					The army and people of the DPRK all out in the action to defend the sovereignty are dealing with everything by the wartime law as required by the wartime state of the inter-Korean relations.
					
					Accordingly, those who faked up the story about the "work done by the north" this time will be sentenced to death without trial for their crimes.
					
					Those who fabricate the groundless story about the "work done by the north" will be labeled as the second traitor Lee Myung Bak.
					
					The new farce faked up by the south Korean puppet group, noisily sounding the confrontation with the DPRK, would only precipitate its final doom.

articles.title: CPRK Secretariat Blasts S. Korean Warmongers' New Strategy against DPRK
articles.content:
CPRK Secretariat Blasts S. Korean Warmongers' New Strategy against DPRK
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- The Secretariat of the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea (CPRK) issued information bulletin No. 1030 Friday as regards that the warmongers of the south Korean puppet military have laid out a "strategy for annihilating the north's army".
					According to the strategy, a computer test simulating an all-out war on the Korean Peninsula showed the annihilation of more than 100 000 troops of the south Korean army 10 days into the war. So the strategy was worked out envisaging destroying the north's armed forces with the massive missile strikes in advance. 
					
					This strategy is said to be included in OPLAN 5015, a new war scenario against the DPRK.
					
					To this end, the puppet military warmongers are desperately moving to purchase cutting-edge war means from abroad, while crying out for possessing their own capabilities for striking all the parts of the north from the south along the Military Demarcation Line by introducing long-range air-to-ground missiles for the present.
					
					This is another serious war provocation plot aimed at a preemptive attack on the DPRK, the information bulletin said, and went on:
					
					The puppet group is fanning up a war fever with such strategy like a puppy unafraid of a tiger. This will only precipitate its destruction.
					
					The revolutionary Paektusan army which regards it as its priority mission to defend the leader, social system and the country, will mercilessly punish the puppet warmongers even before they make first movement. The "annihilation strategy" will never be able to see the light in face of the powerful blows from the DPRK.
					
					What we are concerned is the land of south Korea that can turn into ashes, innocent civilians who can suffer and their properties that can sustain damage due to the puppet warmongers' reckless war frenzy.
					
					We are now making preparations for giving celebration performance in the stronghold of the enemies after reducing it to ashes.
					
					The puppet group should not run wild, clearly seeing the merciless spirit of the army and people of the DPRK all out in the great war of justice for national reunification.

articles.title: Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Syrian President
articles.content:
Greetings to Kim Jong Un from Syrian President
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un, first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK, received a message of greeting from Bashar Al-Assad, president of Syria, on April 10.
					The message extended the warmest greetings to Kim Jong Un and, through him, to the friendly Korean people on behalf of the people and president of Syria on the occasion of the Day of the Sun, April 15 in 2013 that marks the 101st anniversary of the birth of President Kim Il Sung, eternal leader of the Korean people.
					
					In the message the Syrian president said whenever he thinks about the passing of the President, he comes to remember Kim Il Sung who made great achievements, great contribution to the development of the DPRK by leading the Koreans in the most arduous time and laid a foundation for today's successes.
					
					Thanks to the devotion of the President and leader Kim Jong Il and Kim Jong Un's wise leadership the Koreans are now making a progress for the country, the message said.
					
					Availing himself of the opportunity the Syrian president confirmed that Kim Jong Un who was grown up under the care of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il will lead the country true to their line.
					
					The Day of the Sun will be an occasion that encourages Kim Jong Un and the friendly Koreans in future, too, the message stressed.

articles.title: Sympathy to Iranian President
articles.content:
Sympathy to Iranian President
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Kim Yong Nam, president of the Presidium of the Supreme People's Assembly of the DPRK, Thursday sent a message of sympathy to Iranian President Mahmoud Ahmadinejad as regards the earthquake that hit Bushehr Province of Iran, causing many casualties and material losses.
					Kim in his message expressed deep consolation and sympathy to the Iranian president and, through him, to the victims and their bereaved families.
					
					The message expressed belief that the president and government of Iran would eradicate the aftermath of disasters at an early date and bring the living of the residents in the afflicted area to normal.

articles.title: Military Attaches Tour 15th Kimilsungia Festival Venue
articles.content:
Military Attaches Tour 15th Kimilsungia Festival Venue
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- The military attaches corps here went round the venue of the 15th Kimilsungia Festival Friday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					They looked round Kimilsungias that are in full bloom in reflection of the deep reverence of the Korean people and progressive mankind for the President. 
					
					Hassan Reza Husseini, military attache of the Iranian embassy who is a doyen of the military attaches corps, made an entry in the visitor's book:
					
					HE President Kim Il Sung made immortal contributions to accomplishing the anti-imperialist struggle and the cause of global independence.
					
					Not only the Korean people but world progressives cultivated Kimilsungias with sincerity in reverence for him and displayed them to the festival venue,
					
					I wish the army and people of the DPRK greater successes in their struggle to defend peace and stability and build a thriving nation under the wise leadership of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Indonesian Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Indonesian Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- An Indonesian government cultural delegation led by Hari Untoro Dradjat, expert senior staff to the minister of Tourism and Creative Economy, visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung, on Friday. The delegation came here to take part in the 15th Kimilsungia Festival. 
					Members of the delegation looked around the historic relics in his old home, being briefed on his immortal revolutionary life.
					
					The head of the delegation said that he was deeply moved by the visit to the old home in Mangyongdae. 
					
					Kim Il Sung was born in a modest thatched house and embarked on the road of the revolution in his early years, he said, adding: 
					
					The President performed undying exploits for mankind. 
					
					The Korean people deeply revere the President as the father of the nation.

articles.title: Japanese Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
articles.content:
Japanese Delegation Visits Mangyongdae
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- The delegation of the Japan-Korea Society for Scientific and Educational Interchange headed by Chairman Kenki Nakamura visited Mangyongdae, the birthplace of President Kim Il Sung.
					The delegation looked round historic relics preserved in the old home of the President, being briefed on the stories about his undying revolutionary history and the patriotic life of his family members.
					
					At the end of the visit the head of the delegation said: 
					
					Whenever I visit Mangyongdae, I look back on the revolutionary exploits of the President. The longing for the President is getting stronger as the days go by.
					
					The delegation also visited the e-library of Kim Chaek University of Technology, Pyongyang Folklore Park, Pyongyang University of Foreign Studies and so on.

articles.title: Foreign Crewmen Meet
articles.content:
Foreign Crewmen Meet
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Foreign crewmen held a meeting at Chongjin Port in North Hamgyong Province Friday to mark the first anniversaries of the dear respected Kim Jong Un's election as first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					Present there were the captain and crewmen of a Panamanian-flagged ship.
					
					Speakers at the meeting said that holding Kim Jong Un at the top posts of the party and state is an expression of the deep trust of the Korean people in him who is successfully carrying forward the idea and cause of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il.
					
					They noted progressive mankind is regarding it as the greatest glory and happiness to hold Kim Jong Un in high esteem.
					
					The said the world has known well about the distinguished political caliber, outstanding leadership ability and noble traits of Kim Jong Un through the past one year-long reality of the DPRK.
					
					Under his wise leadership the WPK has been strengthened into the staff of the Songun revolution and the Korean People's Army into the invincible revolutionary army, they said.
					
					They wished the Korean people greater successes in the struggle to build a thriving socialist nation and reunify the country.
					
					A letter to Kim Jong Un was adopted at the meeting.

articles.title: Floral Baskets Laid before Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Baskets Laid before Statues of Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Floral baskets were sent to the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill by the family of Zhou Wei, daughter of Zhou Baozhong, Chinese related to the anti-Japanese revolutionary struggle, family of Ya. T. Nobichenko, an internationalist soldier, and Jong Il Sim, Korean woman in Russia, on the occasion of the birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					The floral baskets were placed before the statues on Friday.

articles.title: Floral Basket, Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from Military Attaches Corps
articles.content:
Floral Basket, Congratulatory Letter to Kim Jong Un from Military Attaches Corps
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un was presented with a floral basket and a congratulatory letter by the military attaches corps here on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) and the first anniversaries of Kim Jong Un's election as first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission. 
					Hassan Reza Husseini, military attache of the Iranian embassy here who is a doyen of the military attaches corps, conveyed the floral basket and the congratulatory letter to General of the Korean People's Army Kim Kyok Sik, minister of the People's Armed Forces, on Friday. 
					
					Congratulatory letters to Kim Jong Un from military attaches of the Iranian, Vietnamese, Cuban and Egyptian embassies and the military, naval and air attache of the Chinese embassy were handed over to an official concerned.

articles.title: Floral Baskets, Congratulatory Letters to Kim Jong Un
articles.content:
Floral Baskets, Congratulatory Letters to Kim Jong Un
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un received floral baskets and congratulatory letters from foreign embassies and missions of international organizations here on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun) and the first anniversaries of Kim Jong Un's election as first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the DPRK National Defence Commission.
					They included a floral basket and a congratulatory letter from the chief of the Economic Cooperation Bureau of Libya, a floral basket from the Cambodian embassy and congratulatory letters from the diplomatic envoys of Palestine, India, Cambodia, Egypt, Pakistan and Syria and missions of UNDP, FAO, UNICEF, WFP and WHO. They were handed separately to officials concerned.

articles.title: Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
articles.content:
Floral Tribute Paid to Kim Il Sung, Kim Jong Il
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Members of missions of UNDP, UNICEF, FAO, WFP and WHO here visited the statues of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il on Mansu Hill Friday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					They laid floral baskets before the statues in deep reverence for the peerlessly great men whom the progressives revere for their great exploits for the times and history. They paid tribute to the statues.
					
					On the same day staff members of the Vietnamese embassy here laid a floral basket before the statues.

articles.title: DPRK Football Team Beats Its Hong Kong, China Rival 5:0
articles.content:
DPRK Football Team Beats Its Hong Kong, China Rival 5:0
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Group-8 preliminary matches are under way in Hong Kong, China for the qualification to participate in the 2014 U-14 AFC Soccer Championship. The matches will run from April 11 through 17.
					Involved in the group are the teams of the DPRK, Mongolia, Hong Kong of China, Macao of China and Japan.
					
					The DPRK team trounced its Hong Kong, China rival 5:0 on Thursday.
					
					It will play the second match with Japan on Friday.

articles.title: Joint National Meeting of KCU Organizations Held
articles.content:
Joint National Meeting of KCU Organizations Held
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- A joint national meeting of the Korean Children's Union (KCU) organizations took place here to celebrate the 101st birth anniversary of the great Generalissimo Kim Il Sung. 
					Attending the meeting were representatives of the KCU from all provinces, schoolchildren in Pyongyang and pupils joining it.
					
					Present there on invitation were Choe Thae Bok, Kim Yong Chun, officials of working people's organizations, officials in different fields in Pyongyang, teachers, pupils, war veterans, persons of merit and pupils' parents.
					
					Jon Yong Nam, chairman of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, made a report.
					
					He said that rosy is the future of the members of the KCU thanks to the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un who personified the deep love for posterity and future shown by the peerlessly great persons of Mt. Paektu. 
					
					He called upon all the children to study harder, actively conduct the organizational life, social and political activities and the do-good-thing movement in this significant year marking the 65th founding anniversary of the DPRK and the 60th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War with the pride of being members of the KCU. 
					
					Then followed an admission ceremony of the KCU.
					
					Led by Mun Kyong Dok, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and chief secretary of the Pyongyang City Committee of the WPK, pupils took an oath joining the KCU.
					
					Officials, war veterans and persons of merit put red ties around the necks of children and pinned KCU badges on their chests. 
					
					The pupils who joined the KCU made the first greeting of the KCU loudly replying to the slogan "Let us be always ready for socialist country!"
					
					Then congratulatory speeches were made.

articles.title: 15th Kimilsungia Festival Opens
articles.content:
15th Kimilsungia Festival Opens
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- The 15th Kimilsungia Festival was opened with due ceremony at the Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Exhibition Friday on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					On display at the exhibition are potted Kimilsungias cultivated with all sincerity by many units including armed forces and power organs, ministries and national institutions, service persons, people from all walks of life and school youth and children.
					
					Among them are those presented by the Central Standing Committee of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan, overseas Koreans, missions of different countries and international bodies here, friendly and solidarity organizations and individuals of different countries and members of associations for supporting the dissemination of the immortal flower.
					
					Present at the ceremony were Kim Ki Nam, Yang Hyong Sop, officials of armed forces and power organs, ministries and national institutions, service persons, Pyongyangites, delegations of overseas Koreans and overseas compatriots.
					
					Present there on invitation were the members of the visiting Indonesian government cultural delegation and other foreign guests.
					
					Kim Chang Do, chairman of the Korean Kimilsungia-Kimjongilia Committee, in an opening address said that Kimilsungia is the national treasure of Songun Korea and a great pride and honor of its army and people.
					
					He expressed belief that the festival would contribute to encouraging all service personnel and people in their general advance for bringing about a decisive turn in building a thriving nation under the guidance of the Workers' Party of Korea and developing good neighborly and friendly relations with the world progressives.
					
					Hari Untoro Dradjat, head of the Indonesian government cultural delegation, in a congratulatory speech said that Kimilsungia serves as a symbol of ever-lasting friendly relations between Indonesia and the DPRK.

articles.title: April Spring People's Art Festival Gives Premiere
articles.content:
April Spring People's Art Festival Gives Premiere
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- The premiere of the Third April Spring People's Art Festival was given at theatres, music halls and halls here Friday.
					Among the audience were members of the festival organizing committee, Pyongyangites, youth and students, foreigners and overseas Koreans.
					
					A performance was given by art troupes of North and South Hamgyong and Ryanggang provinces at the Pyongyang Grand Theatre.
					
					The performance began with song and dance "We Are the Happiest in the World". Put on the stage were female chorus "Song of Mangyongdae", folk dance "Playing with Flowers in Spring", flute duet "We Spread Flower Seeds of Revolution" and other colorful numbers.
					
					Through guitar and male quartet "Leader, the Night Is Far Advanced" and female folk song solo "We Sing of This Greatest Happiness" the artistes represented the deep yearning and reverence of all people for President Kim Il Sung who devoted all his life to the country and the people as the sun of the nation.
					
					At the Moranbong Theatre artistes of the National Symphony Orchestra and the Orchestra of the Yun I Sang Music Institute sang high praises of the army building feats performed by Kim Il Sung, iron-will brilliant commander, who defeated two formidable imperialists in one generation and provided the proud history and tradition of the building of the revolutionary armed forces.
					
					Acrobats of the National Circus, provincial art troupes and art squads put colorful magic pieces on the stage of the Pyongyang Circus Theater.
					
					A performance was given by the art troupes of Koreans in China and the International United Confederation of Koreans and art groups of the Samjigang Cooperative Farm in Jaeryong County and the Sangwon Cement Complex.
					
					The artistes of the art troupe of Koreans in China put on the stage immortal classic masterpiece male solo "Nostalgia", female solo "Korea, Let Me Embrace Thee Again" and other numbers with the ardent love for the socialist homeland associated with the great life of the peerlessly great persons.
					
					The art squad of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, the central art squad for increased production and the North Phyongan Provincial Art Squad gave a performance at the National Theatre and the art squads of Pyongyang City, South Hamgyong and North Hwanghae provinces at the Pothonggang Circus Theatre.
					
					The itinerant art squads gave performances at the Yun I Sang Concert Hall and the Pyongyang City Hall of Culture and members of art groups of factories and enterprises at the Pyongyang International Cinema House, the Cultural Hall of the Ministry of Railways and the Central Hall of Workers.
					
					Performances continue.

articles.title: Remembrance Concert Given by DWUK Members
articles.content:
Remembrance Concert Given by DWUK Members
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- A remembrance concert "Our Leader and Women" was given by members of the Democratic Women's Union of Korea at the Women's Hall on Friday to celebrate the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					Put on the stage were numbers like poem and chorus "We Visit Mangyongdae", narrative and chorus "Nostalgia", an immortal classic masterpiece, chorus "Long Live Generalissimo Kim Il Sung", solo "Our Leader", narrative and trio "Journey of Songun Brings Happiness".
					
					The performers praised the immortal feats of the great Generalissimo Kim Il Sung, an peerless patriot, who built the socialist power independent in politics, self-supporting in economy and self-reliant in defence.
					
					Quintet and chorus "Our Satellite Is on Its Orbit", chorus "Our Leader Beloved by People", choral recitation of poem and chorus "We Will Defend General Kim Jong Un at the Cost of Our Lives" represented the will of the women to glorify the glorious era of Kim Jong Un.
					
					Pervading the concert hall was revolutionary enthusiasm of the Korean women to build the most powerful nation and people's paradise on this land under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					The concert was acclaimed by the audience. 
					
					Appreciating the concert were Ro Song Sil, chairwoman of the Central Committee of the union, officials of relevant field and the union and union members in Pyongyang.

articles.title: Oath-taking Meeting Held by Agricultural Workers
articles.content:
Oath-taking Meeting Held by Agricultural Workers
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- An oath-taking meeting was held by agricultural workers before the statue of President Kim Il Sung in Chongsan-ri, Kangso District, Nampho City on Friday on the occasion of his 101st birth anniversary.
					The participants laid bouquets before the statue before paying tribute to him.
					
					Led by Ri Myong Gil, chairman of the C.C., the Union of Agricultural Workers of Korea, agricultural workers vowed to accomplish the revolutionary cause of Juche under the leadership of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un, true to the behests of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					Ri praised Kim Il Sung as the prominent leader and peerlessly elder statesman who performed undying feats for the country and its people, era and history through his unique ideological and theoretical activities and great revolutionary practice all his revolutionary life.
					
					The revolutionary history of Kim Il Sung has been given steady continuity on this land thanks to the intense loyalty, noble sense of moral obligation and energetic guidance of leader Kim Jong Il, Ri noted.
					
					A new chapter of the cause of immortalizing the leaders was ushered in and the revolutionary cause of Juche is being successfully carried forward as the Korean people have Kim Jong Un, another great man of Mt. Paektu, at the top posts of the Workers' Party of Korea and the state, he stressed.
					
					He renewed the will to apply Kim Jong Il's patriotism and devotedly implement the WPK's policy of bringing about a drastic turn in agricultural production and unconditionally carry out the plan for grain production for this year marking the 65th anniversary of the DPRK and the 60th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War and thus become patriotic farmers in the era of Songun upholding Kim Jong Un through increased grain production.
					
					All the participants pledged themselves to glorify forever the undying feats of the Generalissimos who devoted their all to the people's happiness and devote themselves to developing agriculture true to the noble intention of Kim Jong Un and the decision of the recent plenary meeting of the C.C., the Workers' Party of Korea.

articles.title: Performance Given by Workers' Art Group of C.C., GFTUK
articles.content:
Performance Given by Workers' Art Group of C.C., GFTUK
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- A performance was given by the Workers' Art Group of the Central Committee of the General Federation of Trade Unions of Korea at the Central Hall of Workers on Friday to mark the 101st birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					Appreciating the performance were Hyon Sang Ju, chairman of the C.C., the GFTUK, officials and members of trade unions and other workers.
					
					Put on the stage were such colorful numbers as mixed chorus "His Eternal Smile", trombone solo and female trio "Our Leader Unforgettable", poem and story-telling "Cradle of Loving Care."
					
					The performers praised the immortal feats Kim Il Sung performed by embarking on the road of the revolution in his early years and leading the great anti-Japanese war to victory to achieve the historic cause of Korea's liberation and building an invincible socialist power where the people became its master.
					
					The performance fully reflected the noble spiritual world of workers and members of trade unions who devote patriotic devotion to the building of an economic power, true to the party's leadership.
					
					In narrative and female chorus "Song of Blessed People", female solo "Destiny and Future Entrusted to the Leader", poem and chorus "We Will Defend General Kim Jong Un at the Cost of Our Lives" and other numbers, the performers sang of ardent reverence for the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un who has led the all-out confrontation with the U.S. and the building of a thriving socialist nation to victory with his matchless grit, firm resolution and outstanding leadership.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Honor Prizes Awarded to Model Youth League Committees, Young People
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Honor Prizes Awarded to Model Youth League Committees, Young People
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Kim Il Sung Youth Honor Prize and Kim Il Sung Children Honor Prize were awarded to model units on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung. They included 23 primary committees of the youth league and 52 youth league officials and members.
					They built youth league organizations into the Songun youth vanguard organizations, performed feats in defending the country and building a thriving socialist nation and set an example in study and organizational life through a dynamic drive to defend and glorify the idea of the great Generalissimos Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il on the youth movement and their leadership feats.
					
					Kim Il Sung Children Honor Prize went to 208 members of the Korean Children's Union who set an example in study and organizational life, socio-political activities and the do-good-thing movement by learning from the glorious childhood of the Generalissimos.
					
					An awarding ceremony took place here Friday.

articles.title: Jongilbong Literary Prize Instituted in DPRK
articles.content:
Jongilbong Literary Prize Instituted in DPRK
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- The Jongilbong Literary Prize was recently instituted in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea. 
					The prize is awarded to writers who author books that rose to fame as best-sellers in a year.
					
					Its first awardee is Jong Ki Jong, a writer at the April 15 Literary Production Centre.
					
					His hit is the full-length novel "Destiny" in the cycle of novels "Immortal History", which deals with the enduring feats performed by President Kim Il Sung to defend the nation's sovereignty in the period from the mid-1960s to the early 1970s.
					
					The institution has inspired the writers with zeal to author many more books popular among the local people.

articles.title: Youth and Students Meet
articles.content:
Youth and Students Meet
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- A meeting of youth and students was held at the Central Youth Hall Friday to celebrate the first anniversaries of the dear respected Marshal Kim Jong Un's election as first secretary of the Workers' Party of Korea and first chairman of the National Defence Commission of the DPRK.
					Jon Yong Nam, chairman of the Central Committee of the Kim Il Sung Socialist Youth League, made a report to be followed by speeches.
					
					The reporter and speakers said that Kim Jong Un's election was a great fortune of Kim Il Sung's and Kim Jong Il's Korea and the highest honor for the Korean people.
					
					He put forward the young people as the scouting force of the Songun revolution and developed the Korean youth movement on a higher stage as required by the era of historic turn in carrying forward the revolutionary cause of Juche, they noted.
					
					They evinced their resolution to thoroughly carry out the decision made at the March, 2013 Plenary Meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea and significantly glorify this year which marks the 65th anniversary of the DPRK and the 60th anniversary of the victory in the Fatherland Liberation War.

articles.title: Kim Il Sung Possessed of Noble Personality
articles.content:
Kim Il Sung Possessed of Noble Personality
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- President Kim Il Sung was tender-hearted father of the people as well as the leader of the revolution, the greatest ever in history.
					In his lifetime, he was possessed of noble personality that can not be found in any statesman of the world. What he had disliked for life were privilege and special favor for him.
					
					During the anti-Japanese armed struggle, he personally drew water and chopped timbers, when his unit was staying in villages, saying the commander himself, too, was a son of an ordinary family.
					
					Even after the liberation of the country he led a simple and frugal life, arguing that he should take cooked millet as others did. Therefore, he kindly shook oil-tainted hands of a worker and sat knee to knee with peasants to discuss farming. When meeting soldiers, he carefully listened to them about their combat feats and village news.
					
					For him, popular masses were his teacher and the most enjoyable time was when he was among them. His popular traits were manifested in that he had made a long journey of on-site guidance for the happiness of the people all his life, sharing weal and woe with them.
					
					The President pursued the benevolent politics of embracing all of those who loved the country and the nation.
					
					Deeply moved by his magnanimity and generosity, a host of people who once engaged themselves in treachery chose to take to the road of patriotism.

articles.title: U.S. Criminal Acts Are Source of Conflicts in Korean Peninsula: Foreign Expert
articles.content:
U.S. Criminal Acts Are Source of Conflicts in Korean Peninsula: Foreign Expert
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- A British expert in international affairs carried an article titled "U.S. criminal acts are source of conflicts on the Korean Peninsula" on the Fourth Media, a website of China, on Apr. 5 which said:
					The U.S. abuse of military force for criminal purposes for nearly seven decades since the end of World War II to hold hegemony on the peninsula is to blame.
					
					The Korean Peninsula was divided into the north and the south due to the U.S. in 1945.
					
					The U.S. then set up in south Korea the "government" made up of pro-Japanese elements in a sinister bid to put the peninsula and the Asia-Pacific region under its control.
					
					The U.S. dropped A-bombs in Hiroshima and Nagasaki to gain control of hegemony over the Soviet Union and China in the Asia-Pacific region after the Second World War.
					
					The Korean War fought from 1950 to 1953 was started by the U.S.
					
					The war that caused the death of innocent Koreans by the U.S. indiscriminate bombings has not yet finished technically. 
					
					The U.S. and the south Korean puppet regime refused to accept the DPRK's proposal for the conclusion of a peace agreement. The U.S. still maintains its full command of the armed forces for striking the DPRK with nuclear weapons anytime.
					
					The U.S. policy of state-sponsored terrorism constitutes a constant threat to the Korean Peninsula.
					
					All Koreans in the north and the south are aspiring after peace, not war to be enforced by outsiders.
					
					However, their wish has not yet come true. It is because the U.S. mafia government, characterized by dominationism, aggression and terrorism, keeps committing criminal acts under the signboard of "protection".

articles.title: Korean Peninsula Exposed to Danger of Nuclear War
articles.content:
Korean Peninsula Exposed to Danger of Nuclear War
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- The United States has reinforced large amounts of latest military hardware, including nuclear forces, in and around the Korean Peninsula, thus escalating the regional tense situation.
					Its "F-22" fighters were deployed at Osan air-force base in south Korea, in the wake of flights of "B-52" and "B-2A" bombers and portcall of nuclear-powered submarine "Cheyenne" into this region.
					
					Nuclear-powered carriers, "Stennis", operational in the Indian Ocean and Nimitz, anchored at a base of the mainland, are sailing to the Pacific. Meanwhile, two Aegis destroyers were deployed in the West Pacific. 
					
					Such moves for DPRK-targeted nuclear war have lashed into fury the army and the people of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea, who are now in full readiness for action against the U.S.
					
					The artillery units of the Korean People's Army, including the rocket units, have been on standby, zeroing on the targets in the U.S. mainland, Hawai, Guam and south Korea.
					
					While keeping themselves in full combat posture, the civilians are pressing ahead with production and construction, true to the instruction of President Kim Il Sung that construction should be continued until today even if a war may break out tomorrow,.
					
					Jong Yong Sik, a citizen living in Sadong District, Pyongyang, said:
					
					"It is likely that the U.S. has misconception of the DPRK's tough will. An option is not a monopoly of the U.S.
					
					The U.S. should be mindful that the possible war would devastatingly affect the U.S. mainland."

articles.title: U.S. Moves to Ignite Nuclear War against DPRK under Fire
articles.content:
U.S. Moves to Ignite Nuclear War against DPRK under Fire
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association issued a joint statement on Apr. 4 in which they accused the U.S. imperialists of bringing the dark clouds of a nuclear war to hang over the Korean Peninsula.
					The statement said:
					
					The U.S. imperialists' war drills have entered the phase of practical military actions as they are aimed to encroach upon the DPRK's sovereignty and bring down its people-centered socialist system.
					
					The DPRK has its full-fledged right to defend itself from the U.S. aggression. The stand clarified by the DPRK's revolutionary armed forces to cope with the U.S. moves for aggression is the most just one for safeguarding the country's supreme interests, socialist system and sovereignty.
					
					The statement called upon the world progressive forces and peace-loving people to extend positive support to the DPRK, a fortress of independence holding aloft the socialist banner of independence against imperialism.

articles.title: U.S., Wrecker of Peace and Security of Korean Peninsula
articles.content:
U.S., Wrecker of Peace and Security of Korean Peninsula
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- The Korean Peninsula has been exposed to a danger of total war, a nuclear war.
					At this juncture, the United States is steadily hurling latest military hardware into south Korea, with the aim of making precision strikes at major military objects in the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					
					In another development, the U.S. allowed south Korea only to purchase bunker-buster, a bomb capable of neutralizing underground nuclear facilities, whose export to other countries has been banned in principle.
					
					Such moves are intended to disable the DPRK's nuclear deterrent, the mainstay in foiling the deep-rooted U.S. hostile policy toward it, and eradicate socialist Korea from the world's map.
					
					In fact, the U.S. has ceaselessly reinforced its armed forces in the Korean Peninsula to aggravate the tension, after militarily occupying south Korea to use it as a lever for realizing its strategy for supremacy over the Asia-Pacific region.
					
					In the period of the Korean War (June 1950-July 1953), it deployed an aircraft carrier loaded with nukes in waters off Inchon.
					
					In July 1957 it began massively shipping nuclear weapons into south Korea, and at least 1 700 U.S.-made nuclear weapons of various types have been deployed there.
					
					More than 100 U.S. military bases were set up throughout south Korea, with an estimated 37 000 troops at present.
					
					The U.S. Defense Department now intends to give priority to military aids to south Korea, though it is hard pressed for reduction of defense budget.
					
					All the facts go to clearly show it is none other than the U.S. that has created a serious nuclear war crisis in the Korean Peninsula, wrecking the regional peace and security.
					
					Ri Kwang Chol, an officer of the Korean People's Army, said:
					
					The U.S. imperialists' attack on the DPRK, a nuclear state, will be as good as an act of inviting their own destruction
					
					It is quite right for the DPRK to beef up its nuclear deterrent.
					
					If they finally provoke a war, we will deal a preemptive nuclear strike to it, thereby putting an end to the vicious cycle of tension.

articles.title: DPRK Warns Japan of Dreaming of "Shower of Gold" in New Korean War: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
DPRK Warns Japan of Dreaming of "Shower of Gold" in New Korean War: KCNA Commentary
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- There is an ill-boding movement of Japan.
					Government authorities of Japan including the prime minister, foreign minister, defence minister, minister of National Land and Communications and chief Cabinet secretary are openly crying out for taking military steps against the DPRK every day.
					
					They issued orders for prompt counteraction and "measures for destroying missiles", terming the military countermeasures taken by the DPRK to cope with the U.S. actions "provocations."
					
					Orders have been issued to the Coast Guard Agency for taking prompt counteraction and navigation alert posture for guard and watch.
					
					It was announced that PAC-3 of its air "Self-Defence Force" would be deployed in Okinawa Prefecture from late in April on a permanent basis.
					
					Lurking behind Japan's behavior of escalating the tension on the Korean Peninsula is a dangerous aim.
					
					It is the scenario of Japan to seek an opportunity of beefing up its armed forces and reinvading other countries by toeing the U.S. hostile policy toward the DPRK and thus fish in the troubled waters as it did in the past Korean War.
					
					As a matter of fact, it is resorting to a military adventure, offering its archipelago to the U.S. as an advanced base for aggression. This reminds one of what happened on the eve of the past Korean War.
					
					After World War II was over, Japan expressed its intention to join in the U.S. war against the DPRK, stepping up rearmament under the protection of the U.S. It was actually involved in the war. Everything of Japan was mobilized for this war. Its air and naval "Self-Defense Forces" took an active part in the war.
					
					It offered its territory to the U.S. as bases for attack, logistics and repair and participated and rendered cooperation in its operations for razing various parts of the DPRK to the ground. For this Japan came under "shower of gold." 
					
					It is now busy making preparations for a new Korean war.
					
					It has already decided to provide not only U.S. military bases in it and bases of its SDF but also civilian ports and airports to the U.S. in case a new Korean war breaks out.
					
					Formations of F-22 which took off from the U.S. military bases in Okinawa and Japan proper have been deployed in the Osan air force base in south Korea and are waiting for a chance to make a surprise strike at the DPRK.
					
					The conversion of Japan proper into a base for a war clearly proves how hypocritical the Japanese reactionaries' motto of "protecting life and security of its people" is.
					
					Japan had better stop recklessly working for staging a comeback to Korea, depending on its American master.
					
					The DPRK always remembers that Japan was an accomplice in the Korean War ignited by the U.S.
					
					Japan always remains a target of the DPRK's revolutionary armed forces. Once Japan makes even a slight provocation against the DPRK, the former will be hard hit before any others. 
					
					Those who dream of getting a "shower of gold" on the Korean Peninsula are bound to perish in the nuclear disaster.
					
					Japan would be well advised to face up to the situation and behave itself.

articles.title: DPRK's Nuclear Deterrence Is Treasured Sword of Great Paektusan Nation: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
DPRK's Nuclear Deterrence Is Treasured Sword of Great Paektusan Nation: Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- It is the steadfast resolution of the Workers' Party of Korea to successfully build a thriving socialist nation true to the new line on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force. The line is a strategic one to be permanently held fast to for the supreme interests of the Korean revolution. 
					Rodong Sinmun Friday says this in a bylined article.
					
					It goes on:
					
					The imperialists have long attempted to disarm and stifle the DPRK. After the Iraqi war, the U.S. openly revealed its intention to keep pressurizing the DPRK till it makes other option. 
					
					In recent years the U.S. has employed every possible means and method to bring down the social system in the DPRK as evidenced by the declaration of hostile policy to the DPRK, anti-DPRK psychological warfare and subversive and sabotage operations. This shows that the U.S. moves for invasion of the DPRK have reached the extreme phase. 
					
					The DPRK's permanent possession of nuclear weapons is attributable to the invariable aggressive nature of the imperialists and their policy for domination. It is the invariable ambition of the U.S. to militarily invade the DPRK and dominate the Korean Peninsula and the rest of the Asia-Pacific region. 
					
					It is clear that the U.S. will continue the moves to force the DPRK to give up the nuclear deterrence and bring down its socialist system and stifle it by tightening sanctions. 
					
					Strong is the will of the DPRK to strengthen the nuclear deterrence for self-defence to cope with the reckless nuclear threat and aggression moves of the imperialists and their followers. The DPRK will hold tighter the treasured sword, nuclear weapons.

articles.title: Papers Accuses New S. Korean IS Director of His Confrontation Remarks
articles.content:
Papers Accuses New S. Korean IS Director of His Confrontation Remarks
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Nam Jae Jun, new director of the south Korean Intelligence Service (IS), in a recent confirmation hearing of the "National Assembly" made groundless remarks that the April 3 Popular Uprising on Jeju Island was "prompted by a man at the instructions of the north."
					Papers Friday in bylined commentaries term his remarks a malignant calumny on the south Koreans all out in the just patriotic struggle for national independence and reunification, and another provocation against the DPRK.
					
					The April 3 Popular Uprising of Jeju islanders was a people's resistance against fascism and the U.S. which moved to split the Korean nation and establish a puppet regime in south Korea through the "May 10 separate elections" in 1948.
					
					Expressing towering resentment against traitor Nam Jae Jun for inciting hostility and confrontation with fellow countrymen while distorting the history of the just struggle of the south Koreans, Rodong Sinmun goes on:
					
					The traitor described the proud anti-U.S. national salvation resistance of the south Korean people who stood firm against foreign forces' aggression moves as a "rebellion commanded by the north", revealing his true colors as a confrontation maniac sycophantic toward the U.S.
					
					The situation in Korea is so tense that a nuclear war may break out any moment. Nam's provocative remarks under such situation is little different from adding fuel to fire.
					
					He should clearly know that he may not keep his neck for wagging his short tongue.
					
					Minju Joson says that Nam Jae Jun is bound to meet a miserable end like his predecessors for getting frantic in confrontation with compatriots and suppression of the people while freely wagging his tongue.

articles.title: Deplorable Situation of U.S. Styling Itself "Human Rights Champion": News Analyst
articles.content:
Deplorable Situation of U.S. Styling Itself "Human Rights Champion": News Analyst
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- "Freedom" and "democracy" loudly advertised by the U.S. are no more than rhetoric to cover up its unpopular rule and human rights abuses.
					A recent issue of the Russian paper Pravda carried an article titled "Does the U.S. abolish democracy for its citizens?"
					
					The article said: The U.S. is styling itself the most democratic country in the world. This country, however, tops the world list of watch on its citizens. People deride and censure the U.S. for respecting human rights in this manner.
					
					The U.S. has turned into an invisible huge prison as a dense network of watch surveys and controls every movement of people. This is the situation of the U.S. styling itself a "human rights champion."
					
					Let's take New York where the Statue of Liberty is standing as an example. "Everybody will be watched in New York". This is commonly used as a slogan in the city.
					
					Hundreds of thousands of cameras photograph the visitors to subway and various buildings and car plate numbers every day.
					
					What matters is that such human rights abuses are going beyond tolerance limit.
					
					Not content with using cameras, even military drones are used for monitoring.
					
					The monitoring of people by internet is also intensified.
					
					Commenting on this situation, world public warns that overall control over citizens may change into universal dictatorship covered with thin veil of "democracy."
					
					It is a well known fact that one can hardly say about the guarantee of human rights in the U.S. where the specter of fascist dictatorship is haunting.
					
					The U.S. had better settle all human rights abuses before taking issue with others.

articles.title: BRICS Summit Proves Trend of Multi-polarization: News Analyst
articles.content:
BRICS Summit Proves Trend of Multi-polarization: News Analyst
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- The 5th BRICS Summit marked an occasion of proving that the era of hegemony when the U.S. and the West dominated the world is over. 
					The summit took place in South Africa on the theme of "BRICS and Africa-Partnerships for Integration and Industrialization" on March 26 and 27. 
					
					Present there on invitation were Egyptian, Senegalese and other heads of state of African countries and hundreds of high-ranking government delegates unlike the previous summits. 
					
					The summit discussed on the issues of boosting economic growth and reforming international financial institutions by strengthening cooperation between BRICS (Brazil, Russia, India, China and South Africa) and African countries in order to tide over the present economic crisis. 
					
					At the end of the summit the BRICS Business Council was inaugurated and an agreement was reached on setting up a BRICS Development Bank. 
					
					It was reported that if the BRICS Development Bank is set up as agreed upon, the cooperation plans between BRICS countries and developing countries including African countries would be actively pushed forward on the principle of mutual benefit such as settlement with local currency.
					
					Observers appreciate the BRICS Development Bank as a fair and promising financial institution which will terminate the member nations' dependence on the World Bank and IMF and save the developing countries from the U.S. dollar-dominated world economic system now on the verge of collapse. 
					
					Experts said that through the summit African countries clarified their will to sever the economic relations with the Western "donators" which only pursued their egotistic aims from the historic point of view. 
					
					The 5th BRICS Summit clearly proved that the era of multi-polarization reflecting the independent requirements of mankind for righteous development has entered a full-fledged phase.

articles.title: Day of Sun Marked Abroad
articles.content:
Day of Sun Marked Abroad
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Events took place in various countries to mark the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung (the Day of the Sun).
					They included a meeting and film show in Benin, seminar in Democratic Congo and film show in Ethiopia between March 26 and 30.
					
					Korean films shown included "The Tower of the Juche Idea" and "Arms of Korea".
					
					Ali Houdou, general secretary of the Socialist Party of Benin, said the 20th century was, indeed, a century of Kim Il Sung, adding:
					
					Kim Il Sung was a prominent leader and peerlessly veteran statesman who performed undying exploits for humanity and era with his profound idea and theory, extraordinary leadership art and great revolutionary practices.
					
					His life was one of the people's leader who regarded it as his maxim to believe in people as in Heaven and brought it into full bloom in reality by embodying it in ideology and leadership.
					
					Otete Gaston Mboyo, deputy general secretary of the Communist Party of Democratic Congo, said:
					
					Kim Il Sung ushered in a new era of the human cause of independence by founding the immortal Juche idea.
					
					He let the broad working masses firmly arm themselves with the Juche idea and settle all the matters arising in the revolution and construction by themselves. By doing so, he always led the Korean revolution to victory.
					
					A congratulatory message to the dear respected Kim Jong Un was adopted at an event in Benin.

articles.title: Association for Implementing Juche Philosophy Inaugurated in Democratic Congo
articles.content:
Association for Implementing Juche Philosophy Inaugurated in Democratic Congo
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- The Association for Implementing the Juche Philosophy of Democratic Congo was inaugurated on March 22.
					Rohekele Andre, chairman of the National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea of Democratic Congo, welcomed the inauguration of the association, underscoring the need for the study groups of the Juche idea and its followers to put bigger efforts in the work for studying and disseminating great Kimilsungism-Kimjongilism.
					
					He also called for more positively conducting activities for friendship and solidarity with the Korean people.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Venezuela
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un's Work Published in Venezuela
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- The dear respected Kim Jong Un's work "The Great Kim Il Sung Is the Eternal Leader of Our Party and People" was brought out in pamphlet by the Canta Clara Publishing House of Venezuela on April 5.
					The work, made public on April 20, Juche 101 (2012), clarifies the revolutionary exploits of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in their lifetimes. It indicates tasks for firmly defending and eternally glorifying their ideas and exploits.

articles.title: Political Party Leader of Democratic Congo Calls for Fighting against U.S.
articles.content:
Political Party Leader of Democratic Congo Calls for Fighting against U.S.
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- The general secretary of the Communist Party of Democratic Congo in a statement on Apr. 3 called on the world peace-loving people and progressive political parties to turn out as one to fight against the U.S.
					Accusing the U.S. of its nuclear war racket against socialist Korea, he said:
					
					The cutting-edge science and technology are no longer a monopoly of the imperialists and gone are the days never to return when they could threaten the DPRK with nuclear weapons.
					
					The prosperous DPRK is now fully ready to cope with all circumstances politically and militarily.
					
					The U.S. should clearly bear this in mind.
					
					In connection with the situation prevailing on the Korean Peninsula the Communist Party of Democratic Congo expresses support for the will and decision of the army and people of the DPRK to defend the country's independence and sovereignty and the supreme dignity of the nation and socialist system.
					
					The U.S. should pull its troops out of south Korea without condition and make sure that the Korean people achieve the country's reunification in an independent way by their concerted efforts, free from outsiders' interference.

articles.title: Juche Idea Lauded by Personage of Democratic Congo
articles.content:
Juche Idea Lauded by Personage of Democratic Congo
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- The Juche idea which was founded by President Kim Il Sung and enriched by leader Kim Jong Il has become a great guiding idea of the Africans who are under the neo-colonialist policy enforced by the imperialist powers.
					The chairman of the Association for Implementing the Juche Philosophy of Democratic Congo said this at an inaugural ceremony of the association held in Kinshasa on March 22.
					
					He went on:
					
					The DPRK which is successfully defending the dignity of the nation and sovereignty of the country by standing up against the imperialist allied forces is infusing great strength and courage into the world progressive people who are struggling for independence.
					
					Socialist Korea, in which the people are the masters of the country, everything serves them and the systems of free education and free medical care are enforced, is an ideal society envied by all people in the world.
					
					We should not only thoroughly arm ourselves with the Juche idea but make positive efforts to apply it in practice and thus make tangible contribution to the development of the country.

articles.title: Meetings for Solidarity with Korean People Held in UK, Germany
articles.content:
Meetings for Solidarity with Korean People Held in UK, Germany
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Meetings for solidarity with the Korean people were held in UK and Germany on April 6.
					The general secretary of the Central Committee of the New Communist Party of Britain, the spokesman (leader) of the Central Committee of the Revolutionary Party of Britain (Marxist-Leninist), the chairman of the British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and other speakers referred to the touch-and-go situation prevailing on the Korean Peninsula due to the moves of the U.S. imperialists and their lackeys to ignite a nuclear war.
					
					They termed the "resolutions on sanctions" masterminded by the U.S. and its allies at the UN Security Council against the DPRK over its satellite launch for peaceful purposes a wanton violation of the right of a sovereign state and a move to stifle the DPRK.
					
					The third underground nuclear test conducted by the DPRK is a just measure to defend the sovereignty of the country from the aggression and threat of the imperialists, they said, adding:
					
					The new strategic line on simultaneously pushing forward the economic construction and building of nuclear force set forth at the recent plenary meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea is an entirely just line to protect the sovereignty of the country and the dignity of the nation and guarantee the building of a thriving nation.
					
					No one can match the party, army and people of the DPRK under the wise leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un. The DPRK will achieve a final victory in the showdown with U.S. imperialism.
					
					The chairman of the Anti-Imperialist Forum of Germany fully supported all the measures taken by the DPRK to cope with the U.S. nuclear war provocations.
					
					A statement supporting the anti-U.S. all-out action of the Korean people was adopted at the meeting in Germany.

articles.title: ALBA Demands U.S. Halt Its War Moves against DPRK
articles.content:
ALBA Demands U.S. Halt Its War Moves against DPRK
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- ALBA members of Latin America made public a joint statement on Mar. 30, demanding the U.S. stop the moves to ignite a war on the Korean Peninsula.
					ALBA expresses concern over the situation prevailing on the peninsula, the statement said, and went on:
					
					Any military conflict there may pose a threat to the peace and security in the region and bring an untold disaster to mankind.
					
					We strongly demand the U.S. stop all forms of provocations that may cause a military conflict on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					We also hope that the UN Security Council would make efforts for the detente on the peninsula.

articles.title: British Organizations Urge U.S. to Apologize to Koreans for Killing Jeju Island Up-risers
articles.content:
British Organizations Urge U.S. to Apologize to Koreans for Killing Jeju Island Up-risers
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy, the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea and the British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association released a joint statement on Apr. 4 on the occasion of the 65th anniversary of the Jeju Island Popular Uprising in south Korea.
					The statement said that the popular uprising was the just patriotic struggle.
					
					The participants in the uprising waged an unflinching struggle to hold in check and shatter the U.S. imperialists' colonial policy in south Korea and their moves for splitting the Korean nation and achieve the country's independent and peaceful reunification, the statement said, and went on:
					
					The U.S. imperialists and the south Korean puppet forces massacred a lot of patriots in barbarous manner and turned villages into ashes.
					
					The Jeju Island Popular Uprising left a bitter lesson that Koreans can never live with the U.S. murderers under the same sky but have to fight it out against them.
					
					Still alive is the indomitable stamina and fighting spirit of the up-risers.
					
					The U.S. imperialists present in south Korea are getting evermore undisguised in their war moves while steadily threatening the DPRK.
					
					Now is the time for the Yankee U.S. imperialists to apologize to the Korean nation for brutally killing up-risers on Jeju Island and withdraw their troops of aggression from south Korea, concluded the statement.

articles.title: WPK's New Strategic Line Supported by Bangladeshi Political Party Leader
articles.content:
WPK's New Strategic Line Supported by Bangladeshi Political Party Leader
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- Mujahidul Islam Selim, chairman of the Bangladesh Communist Party, expressed full support for the decision of the March, 2013 plenary meeting of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea (WPK) on simultaneously carrying on economic construction and the building of nuclear force.
					He said this when meeting the DPRK ambassador to his country on Apr. 3:
					
					The Bangladesh Communist Party appreciates the decision as a proper measure suited to the situation prevailing on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					The U.S. has threatened the DPRK, arrogantly brandishing its nuclear weapons, but it will not be able to bring into submission the Korean people united close around the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					It is only the U.S. and Western countries that are in fear of the DPRK's up-building of nuclear force.
					
					World progressive political parties including the Bangladesh Communist Party will keep supporting the WPK standing in the forefront against imperialism and the U.S.

articles.title: Koreans in Kyrgyzstan Warn U.S. against Its Nuclear Blackmail
articles.content:
Koreans in Kyrgyzstan Warn U.S. against Its Nuclear Blackmail
Pyongyang, April 12 (KCNA) -- The United Confederation of Koreans in Kyrgyzstan in a statement on April 5 said that gone are the days never to return when the U.S. could resort to its policy of strength, brandishing nuclear weapons.
					Prevailing on the Korean Peninsula is such grave situation that a nuclear war may break out any moment as the U.S. imperialists' brigandish ambition for aggression and the south Korean puppet group of traitors' attempt to invade the north have entered a reckless phase of an actual war, the statement noted, and continued:
					
					The DPRK's new strategic line on simultaneously pushing forward economic construction and the building of nuclear force laid down in view of the prevailing situation is the most just one for firmly protecting the dignity and sovereignty of the nation and achieving peace and prosperity.
					
					It is a clear message and unshakable stand of the DPRK to counter the U.S. imperialists' nuclear blackmail with a merciless nuclear attack and war of aggression with a just all-out war.
					
					The U.S. is sadly mistaken if it thinks it can be safe in a nuclear war.
					
					No force on earth can break the will of all Koreans in the north, south and overseas all out in the just sacred war for national reunification.
					
					The U.S. should stop at once the nuclear war racket, part of its hostile policy toward the DPRK.

articles.title: CRPP denuncia estrategia de exterminio de Sur de Corea
articles.content:
CRPP denuncia estrategia de exterminio de Sur de Corea
Pyongyang, 12 de abril (ACNC) -- En relacion con que recientemente los belicistas surcoreanos salieron con supuesta "estrategia de exterminio al ejercito del Norte de Corea", el Secretariado del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) hizo publica el dia 12 la informacion no. 1030.
					Segun ella, el simulacro de guerra total por computadora en la Peninsula Coreana dio una respuesta de que al cabo de 10 dias despues del estallido de la guerra moriran mas de 100 mil efectivos del ejercito surcoreano, por lo tanto antes de la "marcha hacia el Norte" hay que lanzar gran cantidad de misiles para exterminar todas las fuerzas de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea, senala la nota y prosigue:
					
					Dice que la estrategia se incluira en el "plan de operacion 5015", nuevo guion de guerra de agresion a la RPDC.
					
					Para este fin, los gangsteres militares del Sur de Corea se desesperan por importar los equipos sofisticados de guerra relacionados diciendo que ubicaran de inmediato los misiles de largo alcance aire-tierra, capaces de golpear toda la extension de la RPDC desde las zonas surenas de la Linea de Demarcacion Militar. 
					
					Esto es otra conspiracion provocativa de guerra de agresion a la RPDC mediante el ataque preventivo.
					
					La banda de los titeres surcoreanos arma un alboroto belico con la supuesta "estrategia de exterminio", pero tal campana acelerara solo su autodestruccion.
					
					Responder con el fuego al fuego, con las armas nucleares a las armas nucleares y con el ataque preventivo anticipado al ataque sorpresivo y arrasar limpiamente a los agresores y provocadores es el impetu y temperamento del ejercito y pueblo de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					Nuestro poderoso ejercito revolucionario del monte Paektu, que considera como su mision primera la defensa de su lider, su regimen y su patria, castigara despiadadamente antes de que los belicistas titeres se muevan siquiera un minimo movimiento y entonces la "estrategia de exterminio" no surtira efecto ante el temible fuego artillero de la RPDC. 
					
					Lo que preocupamos es la devastacion de todo el territorio surcoreano y el sufrimiento de los habitantes inocentes y la perdida de sus bienes debido a la imprudente fiebre belica de los belicistas surcoreanos para la agresion al Norte.
					
					Preparamos una escena para ofrecer la funcion en celebracion de la victoria en la guerra sobre los nidos enemigos devastados.
					
					La banda de los traidores debe actuar con prudencia dandose clara cuenta de cual es la verdadera guerra.

articles.title: ACNC comenta sospechosos movimientos de Japon
articles.content:
ACNC comenta sospechosos movimientos de Japon
Pyongyang, 12 de abril (ACNC) -- En estos dias, el premier, el canciller, el ministro de Defensa, el de Territorio Nacional y Comunicacion, el director del secretariado del gabinete y otras autoridades japonesas abogan publicamente por las medidas militares contra la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea. 
					Ordenaron mantenerse en la disposicion de reaccion inmediata y destruir los misiles de la RPDC describiendo como "provocacion" las contramedidas militares tomadas por ella frente a los actos agresivos de Estados Unidos.
					
					En el mismo contexto, la Agencia de Seguridad Maritima recibio la orden de alerta de navegacion.
					
					Desde la segunda mitad de abril, los misiles PAC-3 de las "fuerzas aereas de autodefensa" se emplazaran permanentemente en el departamento de Okinawa.
					
					El actual poder japones intenta preparar la oportunidad de aumento armamentista y nueva agresion, sumandose a la politica hostil a la RPDC de EE.UU., y sacar asi grandes provechos como hizo durante la pasada guerra coreana. 
					
					Realmente, la aventura militar de Japon, que ofrece el archipielago como base avanzada de agresion de EE.UU., hace recordar los dias en visperas de la pasada guerra coreana. 
					
					Despues del fin de la Segunda Guerra Mundial, Japon volvio a acelerar el armamentismo bajo el amparo de EE.UU. y se incorporo a la guerra de agresion del imperio contra Corea. 
					
					Lo todo de Japon, incluso las "fuerzas aereas y maritimas de autodefensa", se ha movilizado en la guerra coreana. 
					
					El pais isleno concedio su territorio como base de ataque, abastecimiento y reparacion de las tropas norteamericanas y obtuvo fabulosas ganancias economicas a cambio de haber ayudado a EE.UU. a reducir a cenizas la RPDC. 
					
					Ahora Japon acelera los preparativos de nueva guerra coreana.
					
					Ya tomo la resolucion de ofrecer a las tropas norteamericanas, en el caso de la nueva guerra coreana, miles de bases norteamericanas en su pais, las de sus "fuerzas de autodefensa" y hasta los puertos y aeropuertos civiles. 
					
					Los escuadrillas de cazas Stealth F-22 despegadas de las bases militares norteamericanas en Okinawa y el territorio japones fueron emplazados en la base aerea de Osan del Sur de Corea acechando la oportunidad de ataque sorpresivo anti-RPDC. 
					
					La conversion del territorio japones en la base de guerra demuestra cuan hipocrita es la consigna de los reaccionarios japoneses por la "defensa de la vida y seguridad de la poblacion". 
					
					Japon debe dejar sus actos imprudentes orientados a lanzar la nueva agresion contra Corea bajo el amparo de su amo norteamericano. 
					
					La RPDC no olvida ni un momento que Japon fue complice de EE.UU. en la pasada guerra coreana. 
					
					Ese pais isleno esta al alcance de fuego de las fuerzas armadas revolucionarias coreanas. 
					
					Debe actuar con prudencia juzgando bien la realidad.

articles.title: Disuasivo nuclear es remedio omnipotente de potencia del Paektu, apunta Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Disuasivo nuclear es remedio omnipotente de potencia del Paektu, apunta Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 12 de abril (ACNC) -- Materializar con exito la causa de la construccion de un Estado prospero socialista tomando invariablemente la nueva linea estrategica del desarrollo paralelo de la construccion economica y la de las fuerzas armadas nucleares, es la decision firme y la voluntad del Partido del Trabajo de Corea.
					Esta linea deviene la estrategica a ser mantenida permanentemente a partir del interes supremo de la revolucion coreana.
					
					Asi senala el diario Rodong Sinmun en un articulo individual de este viernes y continua:
					
					Desde hace mucho tiempo, los imperialistas intentaron desarmar y ocupar la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea.
					
					Despues de terminada la guerra de Irak, Estados Unidos dijo abiertamente que seguiria presionando a la RPDC hasta que ella optara otro camino.
					
					En los ultimos anos se valio de todos los medios y metodos incluyendo la declaracion hostil a la RPDC, la guerra psicologica y las maniobras subversivas y de sabotaje, lo cual demuestra a que grado llegan sus maquinaciones agresivas contra ella.
					
					La perpetuacion de la posesion de las armas nucleares por parte de la RPDC esta relacionada con la invariable naturaleza agresiva y la politica dominacionista de los imperialistas.
					
					Agredir en lo militar a la RPDC y ocupar la posicion hegemonica en la Peninsula Coreana y la region de Asia-Pacifico deviene la ambicion invariable del imperio.
					
					Es muy claro que en futuro tambien seguiran las maniobras del imperio para destruir el disuasivo nuclear y derribar el regimen socialista de la RPDC aplicandole la sancion.
					
					Son invariables la decision y la voluntad de la RPDC de fortalecer en lo cualitativo y cuantitativo el disuasivo nuclear de autodefensa frente a la imprudente amenaza nuclear y las maniobras agresivas de los imperialistas y las fuerzas satelites.
					
					La RPDC intensificara mas las fuerzas armadas nucleares.
